text: Andrea Piribauer is an Austrian para-alpine skier. She skied for Austria at the 1992 Winter Paralympics and won a bronze medal. She was in the Women's Giant Slalom B1-3 event. She was fourth place. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Alpine skiers at the 1992 Winter Paralympics Category:Austrian skiers Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Austria
title: Andrea Piribauer
